mapper.insert: insert into SPAWNING_SITE_AND_FISH (ID, SPAWNING_ID, FISH_ID, SPAWN_RUNOFF, SPAWN_COUNT) values (#{id,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spawningId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{fishId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{spawnRunoff,jdbcType=NUMERIC}, #{spawnCount,jdbcType=NUMERIC})
mapper.select: select ID, SPAWNING_ID, FISH_ID, SPAWN_RUNOFF, SPAWN_COUNT from SPAWNING_SITE_AND_FISH
